text: Taksônnân Abraham hah atar ok suonûkin le Sarah khom aching nâi dôn thei khâiloi rang nikhomsenla, Pathien chu a chonginkhâma taksôn aom sikin pa a la chang ani.11:11:  miziek senkhata chu Sarah hah nâinei rangin atar ok khomin taksônna sikin nâi a la vong ani11:11: Aph 18:11-14; 21:2
